description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end and roof extension to rear (main) roof slope incorporating a Juliet balcony (following demolition of existing rear and side roof extensions and one chimney stack); installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: OS Plan; A100 Existing Site & Roof Plan; A101 Existing Ground Floor Plan; A102 Existing First Floor Plan; A103 Existing Second Floor Plan; A104 Existing Elevations; A2 Proposed Block Plan 1.200; A200 Proposed Site & Roof Plan; A204 Proposed Second Floor Plan Dims; A206 Proposed Elevations; A236 Proposed Planning Section 3; Design and Justification Statement dated 2 February 2022.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
